title: [Large-Scale] Project-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Computer Science Education Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic programming and mathematics education
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service/in-service teachers to practice innovative computer science education methodologies in VR-based simulation environments, developing instructional designs applicable to real classrooms through project-based learning.

learning_goals: Participants can explain three or more computer science education design frameworks reflecting key elements of Education 4.0 (technology integration, industry collaboration, innovation).
Participants can directly design two or more project-based learning activities using VR/simulation tools and develop evaluation rubrics.
Participants can complete one computer science education project that enhances learner collaboration and problem-solving skills, and receive peer feedback and summative evaluation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
